tag_list: webmaster, web-design, seo, marketing, web-2, blogging, sports
overview:
Salvatore (Sal) Surra is a web professional with over 14 years experience in web development, online marketing, SEO, and design.

Since launching his first site in 1996, Sal continued to master his skills in web development and has been mastering websites ever since.

Over the past few years, Sal has taken up blogging, and is also a fantasy sports champion. Currently running several blogs as well as a personal one, makes Sal one of today’s blogging and web 2.0 collaborators.
